channel.title: Comments for page "World Kaiju"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "World Kaiju"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Well I need to summon and defeat a worldkaiju for the trophy anyways, I haven't done so yet. The way I figure it, if I S-rank it, top ranker or not, I have enough emblems for what I need, and get the trophy as well. If I just farm as an attacker, then it would take at least 2 or 3 to guarantee it. So my thought was to kill two birds with one stone, get the emblems and the trophy as well. When I farm for bees, sure, I'll just attack.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: If you're just after S-rank emblems then you can easily farm them as just an attacker, you should be able to get an S-rank from a day's work or less and IIRC that gives you 6, so you could get S-ranks on all the available WK and move on. Of course summoning is more profitable if it goes smoothly but if it gets saturated then I find it more trouble than it's worth. Plus it's not really fair to maximise profits if other summoners end up burning because of it…

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Well then. I suppose I should summon one then, cause I definitely need some s-rank emblems for things.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
jim - "2+enraged+awesome+possible top 10"
IIRC the 2 in the equation becomes 11. For all achieved tiers

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: When it says you receive a "full set of emblems" for each rank you do against your own summoned wkai, how many emblems? Is it the same 2+enraged+awesome+possible top 10, or do you get more for it having been your wkai?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Or to be more accurate with the upgrade it is 10.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Scratchy Enhancer +20% Win a Scratchy ticket today (or play 20 tickets)

It is 10 tickets now.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Anima's info is partially right and partially wrong. You don't need max levels, it's helpful but it's a pain in the butt. Have at least 50. As for the third ally, you should use your +10 level EotS ally until doughman3. I believe Legacy has the nin EotS ally, and there are 2 nin wkai. Yet another reason to be legacy. The 30% from your wkai ally shouldn't be very helpful if you have a lot of other +% dmg bonuses (which you will need to be successful). Another minor change, you can get +5 range summons for gen and nin. Tai is the only stat you should have a +4 summon for

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
hmm, i don't know if i am an experienced player but i will tell you how i did/do it:

I maxed my levels (= lvl75 @ s26),
set my WK-Awesome to LvL 3,
drink all KaijuBomb-juice,
sacrifice all rides for +dmg,
get the Scratchy Enhancer Bonus,
get the Glowslinging Bonus.

the rest comes from all the items i have.

Team: i use the +8/+8 Wasteland ally, with a +3/+6 lvl 2 sound ninja (range bigger lvls because you have less of it) and the +30% ally for the stat i am fighting.

don't forget summons count so summon a + 4 range summon for the WK fight

i also always us the 'This Fist of Mine' Jutsu

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Can we get an experienced player to put something here about suggested minimum stats and which bonuses are good vs too expensive, or maybe a wkai guide on a new page?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: The Penalty for not winning changed from no awesome to no consumables.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: But either way, none of them are allowed in your team, even if they're together? Eh, I guess it's for narrative purposes.

item.title: Re: jimwormmaster
item.content:encoded:
Yes. I did a test. Only one quote is displayed, and after doing some checking the priority of the quote goes like this:
Timmy > CiCi > MC Stripeypants > Terri > Flipper.
The system will display the quote of the leftmost ally that is in your team.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Soâ€¦it says on basically all the ally pages, the ones from the Hey! Fight! Lightning Brigade! quest, that they refuse to help you with Wkai. Is this true, even if your team is made completely with 3 out of those 5 allies, like, say, a team of Flipper, CiCi lvl 2, and Timmy lvl 2?
